data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Makedonski Brod, North Macedonia to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Makedonski Brod, North Macedonia

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Makedonski Brod, North Macedonia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 599 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Makedonski Brod a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Makedonski Brod against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Albanian, Macedonian people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, please defend the 12 believers in Makedonski Brod against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Makedonski Brod, North Macedonia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.section_summary:
the state of Makedonski Brod, North Macedonia has a population of 7,200.

We estimate Makedonski Brod has 12 people who might know Jesus, 4,450 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,738 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 599 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Makedonski Brod, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.
